net.sf.jclal.core

Interface IBatchMode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JCLAL, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBatchMode, QBestBatchMode

    public interface IBatchMode
extends JCLAL
    Interface for batch mode active learning. It selects Q instances from the total of instances. It is used internally by a scenario.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Integer> instancesSelection(IQueryStrategy queryStrategy, List<Container> intanceUtilities)
      Select q instances taking into account their utility and the query strategy
      String toString()
      String representation.

    • Method Detail

      • instancesSelection

        List<Integer> instancesSelection(IQueryStrategy queryStrategy,
                                 List<Container> intanceUtilities)
        Select q instances taking into account their utility and the query strategy
        Parameters:
        queryStrategy - The query strategy used
        intanceUtilities - Array that stores the utility of each unlabeled instance
        Returns:
        A list that contains the indexes of the selected instances

      • toString

        String toString()
        String representation.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        The string of the object.
